name: Liberty Information Management Systems
overview:
Liberty Information Management Solutions develops LibertyNET software platforms for a wide range of use cases including electronic document management, report management, records management, document imaging, and unstructured data management services.

Liberty sells its products through resellers and original equipment manufacturers in transportation, government, financial, education, legal, insurance, healthcare, manufacturing, and law enforcement markets. Liberty Information Management Solutions was founded in 1987 and is based in Costa Mesa, California with an additional office in Ottawa, Canada. As of July 8, 2008, Liberty Information Management Solutions, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Hyland Software.

acquisition.source_description: Hyland Software Acquires Liberty Information Management Systems
